projects.title: FitTrack Pro
projects.description: A comprehensive fitness tracking app with workout plans, nutrition tracking, and social features. Helps users achieve their fitness goals with personalized recommendations.
projects.longDescription: FitTrack Pro is a state-of-the-art fitness application that combines workout tracking, nutrition monitoring, and social motivation. Built with native iOS and Android versions, it features real-time heart rate monitoring, AI-powered workout recommendations, and integration with popular wearables. The app has helped over 100,000 users achieve their fitness goals.
features: Personalized workout plans based on fitness level
Real-time heart rate and calorie tracking
Integration with Apple Watch and Wear OS

projects.title: CryptoWallet Plus
projects.description: Secure cryptocurrency wallet supporting multiple chains with real-time portfolio tracking, price alerts, and DeFi integration.
projects.longDescription: CryptoWallet Plus is a secure, non-custodial cryptocurrency wallet that supports over 50 blockchain networks. Features include hardware wallet integration, DeFi protocol access, NFT gallery, and advanced security with biometric authentication and multi-signature support.

projects.title: TaskMaster
projects.description: Advanced task management app with team collaboration, time tracking, and project management features for professionals.
projects.longDescription: TaskMaster revolutionizes project management with its intuitive interface and powerful features. Built for teams of all sizes, it offers Kanban boards, Gantt charts, time tracking, and seamless integration with popular tools like Slack, Jira, and GitHub.

projects.title: FoodieHub
projects.description: Social food discovery app with restaurant reviews, photo sharing, and personalized recommendations based on taste preferences.
projects.longDescription: FoodieHub connects food lovers worldwide through restaurant discoveries, photo sharing, and personalized recommendations. Using machine learning, it learns user preferences and suggests new dining experiences. Features include AR menu translation and real-time table booking.

projects.title: MindfulMe
projects.description: Meditation and mindfulness app with guided sessions, mood tracking, and sleep stories for mental wellness.
projects.longDescription: MindfulMe is a comprehensive mental wellness application offering guided meditations, breathing exercises, sleep stories, and mood tracking. With content from certified therapists and meditation experts, it helps users reduce stress and improve mental health.

projects.title: StudyBuddy
projects.description: AI-powered study assistant with flashcards, note-taking, and collaborative learning features for students.
projects.longDescription: StudyBuddy transforms the learning experience with AI-powered study tools, smart flashcards, and collaborative features. It uses spaced repetition algorithms to optimize learning and includes features like document scanning, formula recognition, and group study rooms.

projects.title: TravelMate
projects.description: Complete travel companion app with itinerary planning, expense tracking, and offline maps for globetrotters.
projects.longDescription: TravelMate is the ultimate travel companion, offering itinerary planning, expense tracking, offline maps, and local recommendations. It features real-time flight tracking, currency conversion, language translation, and emergency contacts for over 200 countries.

projects.title: CodeSnap
projects.description: Code snippet manager with syntax highlighting, cloud sync, and team sharing for developers.
projects.longDescription: CodeSnap helps developers organize, share, and access code snippets across devices. Features include syntax highlighting for 100+ languages, GitHub Gist integration, team workspaces, and AI-powered code explanation.
